channel.title: [PI] funpk help
channel.description:
im adding funpk to my version of castlewars so that players are able to attack each other but i came across something weird.
When you are in the area it says -51 wildy so u cannot attack any1 - this rises when u go north and lowers when moving south, how can i have it so you are able to attack players without the wildy level.
so its free pk all levels can attack each other, and get rid of the wildy level thing??

item.title: [PI] funpk help
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]No.

Find the method in Client class for wildLevel.[/quote]
hmm i can not find that, is their a way that i can add attack options and allow attacking other players with out including the area in “isinWildy”

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] funpk help
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Woops. Missed that this is [PI].

Since he didn’t know how to do this, I figured it was Delta >.>

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] funpk help
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:2, topic:379623”]Search “ifInWild”

if (inPkBox()) { wildyLevel = ##; } [/quote]

umm so like this?

public boolean isInCastle() { if(absX > 2366 && absX < 2431 && absY > 3071 && absY < 3137 || absX > 2354 && absX < 2410 && absY > 9497 && absY < 9545 || absX > 2395 && absX < 2435 && absY > 9474 && absY < 9511) { wildyLevel = 100; return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
